setting.location: Personal quarters aboard research station orbiting planet Solaris

characters.appearance: Man, early 30s, brown hair disheveled, face contorted with desperate reasoning, gesturing frantically
characters.clothing: Station uniform wrinkled from agitated movement, sleeves pushed up
characters.position: Pacing back and forth in small space, stopping to point at various objects
characters.action: Moving frantically between scientific explanations, touching equipment as if to ground himself in reality, hands shaking slightly

characters.appearance: Woman, late 20s, dark hair, unchanged expression, watching calmly
characters.clothing: Same simple dress, no reaction to man's agitation
characters.position: Still sitting on bed edge, same position as before
characters.action: Observing man's distress with serene detachment, head turning slightly to follow his pacing

scene.mainElements: Same small quarters now feeling like a psychological pressure chamber, scientific equipment that should provide rational explanation failing to make sense of situation
scene.details: Man's personal belongings scattered from frantic searching, station equipment humming normally in contrast to psychological chaos, shadows shifting as man moves frantically, no text or letters visible
scene.background: Station architecture unchanged but feeling less solid, porthole view of alien planet seeming more ominous, normal surroundings taking on dreamlike quality
scene.atmosphere: Psychological desperation, rational mind fighting impossible reality, growing panic beneath forced scientific calm, foundation of logical understanding cracking

composition.cameraAngle: Dynamic shot following character's frantic movement
composition.focus: Contrast between man's agitation and woman's supernatural calm
composition.depth: Pacing character creating motion in foreground, still figure providing stable middle ground, disorienting background environment

colorPalette.usageNotes: Cool tones dominate with pops of vibrant neon lighting

lineArt.texture: smooth digital, hard edges on tech

lighting.intensity: high contrast (bright neon vs deep shadow)
lighting.highlights: lens flares, neon glows on surfaces

rendering.texture: smooth with textured brushes for atmosphere
rendering.detailLevel: high in focal points (tech details), looser elsewhere

perspective: dynamic perspective (wide-angle vistas or low-angle hero shots)
